name: Balance of Power (itch) (Genteel1)
description:
Ludum Dare #49 Entry: Unstable

Move through rooms by draining or charging devices, making sure not to overload or empty yourself.

Controls

Controller (recommended):

Left stick to move, right stick to target charging beam.

South Button to jump.

Left/Right shoulder buttons to change direction of power flow.

Keyboard:

A/D to move.

Arrow keys to target the charging beam.

Spacebar/W to jump.

Left/Right shift to change direction of power flow.
